mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.title, b.picture, u.avatar, b.author_id AS authorId, u.user_name AS authorName, COUNT(l.id) as like_count, MAX(CASE WHEN l.status = 1 AND l.user_id = #{userId} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS status FROM sys_blog b LEFT JOIN sys_likes l ON b.id = l.post_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON b.author_id = u.id WHERE b.status = 0 AND b.examine = 0 AND b.id = #{postId} GROUP BY b.id ORDER BY like_count DESC

SELECT b.id, b.title, b.picture, u.avatar, b.author_id AS authorId, u.user_name AS authorName, f.update_time AS updateTime, f.status FROM sys_blog b LEFT JOIN sys_favor f ON b.id = f.post_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON b.author_id = u.id WHERE b.status = 0 AND b.examine = 0 AND f.status = 1 AND f.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY updateTime DESC
